blogPost.excerpt: Here you'll find a collection of hand-curated tools that let you get more done with less time and effort 🚀 Each app has been designed with a specific task in mind, on top of being beautiful, intuitive, and fun to use 🤘
blogPost.body: Here you'll find a collection of hand-curated tools that let you get more done with less time and effort 🚀 Each app has been designed with a specific task in mind, on top of being beautiful, intuitive, and fun to use 🤘
blogPost.title: Hidden Tools - Explore a collection of hand curated tools 🛠
blogPost.author: Sharath Kuruganty

localize.description: 在这里，你会发现一系列精心设计的工具，让你用更少的时间和精力完成更多的工作🚀，每个应用程序都是针对特定的任务而设计的，除了美观、直观和有趣的使用🤘。
localize.tagline: 探索一系列手工制作的工具 🛠。

localize.description: 在這裏，你會發現一系列精心設計的工具，讓你用更少的時間和精力完成更多的工作🚀，每個應用程序都是針對特定的任務而設計的，除了美觀、直觀和有趣的使用🤘。
localize.tagline: 探索一系列手工製作的工具 🛠。

previous.excerpt: Incident Timer is a “days without incident” timer for developers. The beautifully designed dashboard helps you to keep track of major software incidents. It’s free and takes just 2 minutes to set up.
previous.title: Incident Timer - A “days without incident” timer for developers

localize.description: Incident Timer是一款专为开发者设计的 "天无事故 "计时器。设计精美的仪表盘可以帮助你跟踪重大软件事件。它是免费的，只需要2分钟就可以设置。
localize.tagline: 开发者的 "无事故天数 "计时器

localize.description: Incident Timer是一款專爲開發者設計的 "天無事故 "計時器。設計精美的儀表盤可以幫助你跟蹤重大軟件事件。它是免費的，只需要2分鐘就可以設置。
localize.tagline: 開發者的 "無事故天數 "計時器

next.excerpt: The next time you are with your co-founder or potential partner, get to know them better by taking turns answering questions from this deck of co-founder cards... Learn more about each other so you can work better both together and individually.
next.title: Co-founder Question Cards - Questions to ask your co-founder to know each other better.

localize.description: 下次你和你的联合创始人或潜在的合作伙伴在一起的时候，可以通过轮流回答这副联合创始人牌中的问题来更好地了解他们...... 更多地了解对方，这样你们才能更好地合作和单独工作。
localize.tagline: 问你的联合创始人一些问题，以便更好地了解对方。

localize.description: 下次你和你的聯合創始人或潛在的合作伙伴在一起的時候，可以通過輪流回答這副聯合創始人牌中的問題來更好地瞭解他們...... 更多地瞭解對方，這樣你們才能更好地合作和單獨工作。
localize.tagline: 問你的聯合創始人一些問題，以便更好地瞭解對方。
